job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Human Resources,Information Technology and Services
job.description: brstrongDo what you love Love what you do brbrstrong At Workday we help the worlds largest organizations adapt to whats next by bringing finance HR and planning into a single enterprise cloud We work hard and were serious about what we do But we like to have fun too We put people first celebrate diversity drive innovation and do good in the communities where we live and work brbrstrongAbout the TeambrstrongWe believe if you do what you love youll love what you do Theres a lot to love at Workday Boulder Part of a global highgrowth technology company our Workday Boulder team has the unique opportunity of developing the next generation of Workdays groundbreaking collaborative products supporting a customer base of more than 31 million strong You will solve complex problems and influence teams across Workday as you build enterprise software Thrive in our fun peoplefirst culture that creates an environment passionate about your success and ability to do your best work Join us as we change the way millions of people workAre you incredibly motivated by witnessing machine learningAI products come to life in production settings which impact tens of millions of people Workdays Machine Learning organization is bringing AI first products to life at every step of the Workday product offering Were looking for highly creative resultsoriented and deeply skilled machine learning engineersscientists to help on a range of these challengesbrstrongAbout the RolebrbrstrongThe Machine Learning Engineer constructs studies and trains algorithms that can learn from complex high dimensionality data in order to uncover patterns from which practical and usable predictive models and applications can be developed They will also use machine language and statistical modeling techniques such as decision trees logistic regression Bayesian analysis and others to develop and evaluate algorithms to improve productsystem performance quality data management and accuracybrbrstrongAbout YoubrbrstrongBasic Qualificationsbrulli3 or more years of validated experience as part of a data science machine learning or other software development teamliliProven track record using Python or Java in production environmentsbrliulstrongOther QualificationsstrongulliExecution of products handling largescale complex data sets data modeling and productizing machine learning algorithmsliliConfirmed programming skills in Python using numpyscipy sklearn and pandasliliInterest or experience in information extraction text mining natural language processing recommendation systems and search relevanceliliSelfmotivation a strong sense of ownership and an enjoyment of a startuplike environmentliliAn ability to balance a speedtomarket with shipping high quality and pragmatic solutionsbrbrbrliulstrongstrongColorado Equal Pay StatementbrstrongstrongDisclosure required by sb19085 8520 of the minimum salary compensation for this role to be located in the state of Colorado Minimum salary for the role is listed below As a part of the compensation package this role may include eligible bonuses equity and commissions For more information regarding Workday
